rather.question: Swim deep in the sea with Ariel -or- Fly high in the sky with Peter Pan?
Live with annoying stepsisters -or-live with controlling Mother Gothel?
Race as fast as Lightning McQueen -or- Fly on a magic carpet like Aladdin?
Have a hook for a hand -or- have giant Dumbo ears?
Be raised by three fairies like Aurora - or- be raised by a pack of wild gorillas like Tarzan?
Be accident prone like Goofy -or- have a bad temper like Donald Duck?
Be as sweet as Minnie Mouse -or- be as beautiful as Snow White?
Have Elsa's icy powers -or- have Rapunzel's magic golden hair?
Have to clean up after the Seven Dwarfs -or- clean up after Cinderella's step sisters & wicked stepmother?
Fall in love with a Beast like Belle -or- kiss a frog like Tiana?
Live in the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse -or- in Cinderella's castle?
Have Pascal as your sidekick -or- have Flounder as your sidekick?
Be able to smash things like Wreck it Ralph -or- Swing thro0ugh the trees like Tarzan?
Find Sulley the Monster in your closet -or- find Stich under your bed?
Be wanted by the law like Flynn Rider -or- have your Stepmother try to poison you with an enchanted apple?
Be on a super team with Baymax -or- be part of the Incredibles Family?
Live with enchanted talking furniture like Belle -or- save your kingdom with a talking Snowman like Anna?
Be forced to eat stale crackers from the Sultan -or- squishy forest grubs like Simba?
Have Elsa's long, white, braided hair -or- Merida's red, curly, wild hair?
Eat a poisoned apple like Snow White -or- kiss a frog like Tiana?
Have an enchated Fairy Godmother -or- a Magic Genie in a lamp?
Sail the high seas like Prince Eric -or- be king of the jungle like Tarzan?
Have Merida's bow and arrows -or- Cinderella's glass slippers?
Dance with Prince Charming at a royal ball -or- canoe down a giant river with Pocahontis?
Ride the Teacups ten times in a row -or- listen to 'It's a Small World' song all day?
Eat an ice cream sundae on Main Street -or- snack on fresh cinnamon churros?
Borrow an ourfit from Minnie Mouse -or- trade losets with Jasmine?
Be captured by the Pirates of the Caribbean -or- fight the enchanted dragon in Sleeping Beauty?
Get soaking wet on Splash Mountain -or- take a hauting tour through the Haunted Mansion?
See the fireworks over the Castle -or- watch the floating lights in Rapunzel's Kingdom?
Free with fright on the Tower of Terror -or- Scream as loud as you can on Soarin'?
Go snow sledding with Olaf & Sven -or- go tractor tipping with Mater & Mcqueen?
Wear Jasmine's Arabian outfit in a snow storm -or- have Anna's winter cape in the blistering summer?
Get a ride to school on Kristoff's sled -or- on Aladdin's magic carpet?
Have your nose grow like Pinocchio -or- accidentally turn your mother into a bear like Merida did?
Sign your name wearing Mickey's big white glovers -or- ride a bike with Ariels mermaid tail?
Have your nose stuck in a book like Belle -or- cook in a restaurant like Tiana?
Giggle like the hyenas in the Lion King -or- roar like the Beast?
Brush your hair with a fork like Ariel -or- dress like a soldier like Mulan?
Live in the Jungle with Baloo the Bear -or- live in the forest with Bambi and friends?
Earn gold doubloons by solving pirate problems with Jake -or- steal from the rich and give to the poor with Robin Hood?
Own a light saber -or- a magic wand?
Have a long white beard like the Seven Dwarfs -or- have a short black curly beard like Jafar?
Live in Pixie Hollow -or- at the Magic Kingdom?
Fly by holding a giant bunch of helium balloons -or by getting sprinkled with Pixie Dust?
Sleep for 100 yersr like Aurora -or- always be tired like Sleepy the Dwarf?
Have to take care of 101 Dalmatian puppies -or- have to keep track of Sitch the Alien?
